english.segment1: Left to negotiate with no sense of knowing. When freedom over truth has triumphed. Free to be lost and disconnected. Given as much value as free things often are
english.segment2: Keep me close to you. Don't let me be alone. Discarded but not overthrown. I'm useless, yes it's true. Keep me, fresh and new. Don't make me obsolete. I still have hands to wash your feet. My uselessness is you
english.segment3: I could be worth my weight in labor. I could be worth my death in favors. You could monitor my list of things to do. And you could overlook my anonymous service to you
english.segment4: The sum of my marketable skills. My part in the collective will. Abilities that you would own. And use in ways I don't condone. Produce and receive my meal. Discard me when I fall ill
english.segment5: How can I profit you.. What useful thing can I do?. (Useful, useless to you)
